mapper.insert: INSERT INTO imwechat.message (id, fromUserId, toUserId, toGroupId, content, type, fileUrl, originalFilename, createTime) VALUES (#{id}, #{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{toGroupId}, #{content}, #{type}, #{fileUrl}, #{originalFilename}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()));
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, avatarUrl AS fromAvatarUrl FROM imwechat.message m LEFT JOIN imwechat.user u ON u.id = m.fromUserId WHERE fromUserId = #{userId} OR toUserId = #{userId} OR toGroupId = 0
